getBlockSignSize

public int getBlockSignSize()
Returns this index's block sign size. This value defines the number of events that make up a block for block signatures. A value of 0 means block signing is disabled.

Returns:
This index's block sign size.

getColdPath

public java.lang.String getColdPath()
Returns this index's colddbs's absolute file path, or null if not specified. This value may contain shell expansion terms.

Returns:
this index's colddbs's absolute file path.

getCompressRawdata

public boolean getCompressRawdata()
Deprecated. Splunk always compresses raw data.

Returns whether or not raw data is compressed.

getFrozenTimePeriodInSecs

public int getFrozenTimePeriodInSecs()
Returns how long, in seconds, that this index's data rolls to frozen. If archiving is necessary for frozen data, see coldToFrozen attributes.

Returns:
How long, in seconds, that this index's data rolls to frozen.

public java.lang.String getHomePath()

getMaxDataSize

public java.lang.String getMaxDataSize()
Returns this index's maximum data size, in MB or "auto" or "auto_high_volume", before triggering a roll from hot to warm buckets.

getMaxHotIdleSecs

public int getMaxHotIdleSecs()
Returns this index's hot bucket's maximum life, in seconds. A value of zero means infinite.

Returns:
This index's hot bucket's maximum life, in seconds.

Returns this index's maximum number of lines permissible in the .data file. A value of zero means infinite.

public java.util.Date getMaxTime()
Returns this index's max time attribute, or null if not specified.

Returns:
This index's max time attribute.

getMaxTotalDataSizeMB

public int getMaxTotalDataSizeMB()
Returns this index's maximum allowable size, in MB. If the index grows larger, the oldest data is frozen.

Returns:
This index's maximum allowable size, in MB.

getMaxWarmDBCount

public int getMaxWarmDBCount()
Returns this index's warm bucket count maximum. If this value is exceeded, the warm buckets with oldest latest times are moved to cold.

Returns:
This index's warm bucket count maximum.

getMemPoolMB

public java.lang.String getMemPoolMB()
Returns this index's memory pool, in MB or "auto".

Returns:
This index's memory pool, in MB.

getMinRawFileSyncSecs

public java.lang.String getMinRawFileSyncSecs()
Returns this index's file system sync frequency while compressing journal slices. Note that a value of "disable" disables this feature completely, while a value of 0 forces a filesystem sync after every journal slice.

Returns:
This index's file system sync frequency while compressing journal slices.

getMinTime

public java.util.Date getMinTime()
Returns this index's minimum time attribute, or null if not specified.

Returns:
This index's minimum time attribute.

getPartialServiceMetaPeriod

public int getPartialServiceMetaPeriod()
Returns this index's meta data sync interval, in seconds. A value of zero disables sync until a requested metadata sync.

Returns:
This index's meta data sync interval, in seconds.

getQuarantineFutureSecs

public int getQuarantineFutureSecs()
Returns this index's future event time quarantine, in seconds. Events that are newer than now plus this value are quarantined.

Returns:
This index's future event time quarantine, in seconds.

getQuarantinePastSecs

public int getQuarantinePastSecs()
Returns this index's past event time quarantine, in seconds. Events that are older than now minus this value are quarantined.

Returns:
This index's past event time quarantine, in seconds.

getRawChunkSizeBytes

public int getRawChunkSizeBytes()
Returns this index's raw slice uncompressed size, in bytes.

Returns:
This index's raw slice uncompressed size, in bytes.

getRotatePeriodInSecs

public int getRotatePeriodInSecs()
Returns this index's hot bucket creation check frequency. This value also indicates warm to cold and cold to frozen check frequency.

Returns:
This index's hot bucket creation check frequency.

getServiceMetaPeriod

public int getServiceMetaPeriod()
Returns this index's meta data sync frequency.

Returns:
This index's meta data sync frequency.

getSuppressBannerList

public java.lang.String getSuppressBannerList()
Returns a comma separated list of indexes that suppress index missing messages.

Returns:
A comma separated list of indexes that suppress index missing messages.

getSync

public boolean getSync()
Returns this index's sync attribute.

Returns:
This index's sync attribute.

getSyncMeta

public boolean getSyncMeta()
Returns this index's syncMeta attribute. When true, a sync operation is invoked before the file descriptor is closed on metadata updates.

Returns:
This index's syncMeta attribute.

public java.lang.String getThawedPath()

This index's absolute path to the thawed index.

submit

public void submit(java.lang.String data)
Submits an event to this index through HTTP POST.

Parameters:
data - Event data posted.

upload

public void upload(java.lang.String filename)
Uploads a file to this index as an event stream. Note: this file must be accessible to the splunk instance as a local file or through NAS.

Parameters:
filename - The file uploaded.
